languages.text: "Ваши цвета, Лорд-инквизитор, столь же насыщенны, сколь и многогранны. Никогда не встречала подобных вам — незамутненные оттенки перетекают из одного в другой... удивительная гармония. Удивительная и... пугающая". {n}Кассия вскидывает подбородок и сдержанно кивает.{/n} "То, что человек подобного статуса и талантов следит за благополучием Дома Навис Нобилите — большая честь".

"Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."
languages.original_text: "Ваши цвета, Лорд-инквизитор, столь же насыщенны, сколь и многогранны. Никогда не встречала подобных вам — незамутненные оттенки перетекают из одного в другой... удивительная гармония. Удивительная и... пугающая". {n}Кассия вскидывает подбородок и сдержанно кивает.{/n} "То, что человек подобного статуса и талантов следит за благополучием Дома Навис Нобилите — большая честь".

Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

"Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

languages.text: “大审判官大人，您的色彩无比丰富，包罗万象。我以前从来没见过这样的景象，没有一丝杂质的色彩，从一处流到另一处……带着惊人的和谐。实在是太惊人了……令人心生敬畏。”{n}卡西娅扬起下巴，端庄地点了点头。{/n}“如此尊贵、如此智慧的人在意导航宗族的福祉，这对我们而言是莫大的荣誉。”
languages.original_text: "Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: “审判长大人，您的色彩无比丰富，包罗万象。我以前从来没见过这样的景象，没有一丝杂质的色彩，从一处流到另一处……带着惊人的和谐。实在是太惊人了……令人心生敬畏。”{n}卡西娅扬起下巴，端庄地点了点头。{/n}“如此尊贵、如此智慧的人在意导航宗族的福祉，这对我们而言是莫大的荣誉。”

languages.text: «Lord Inquisidor, sus colores son tan ricos como polifacéticos. Nunca había visto algo parecido: tonos prístinos que fluyen de unos a otros... la armonía es asombrosa. Asombrosa... y aterradora». {n}Cassia eleva la barbilla y asiente tímidamente.{/n} «Que alguien de su categoría y talento se interese por el bienestar de una casa de la Navis Nobilite es todo un honor».
languages.original_text: "Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Inquisidor, sus colores son tan ricos como polifacéticos. Nunca había visto algo parecido: tonos prístinos que fluyen de unos a otros... la armonía es asombrosa. Asombrosa... y aterradora». {n}Cassia eleva la barbilla y asiente tímidamente.{/n} «Que alguien de su categoría y talento se interese por el bienestar de una casa de la Navis Nobilite es todo un honor».

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジター、あなたの色は、実に豊かで多面的なものですね。このようなものを見るのは初めてです…にごりなき色調が、次から次へと流れ行く…驚くべき調和、そして驚くべき…恐ろしさ」{n}カシアは顎を上げ、控えめにうなずく。{/n}「これほどの地位と能力を持つ方が、航宙貴族の家の幸福に関心を寄せてくださったこと、大変光栄に思います」
languages.original_text: "Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジター、あなたの色は、実に豊かで多面的なものですね。このようなものを見るのは初めてです…にごりなき色調が、次から次へと流れ行く…驚くべき調和、そして驚くべき…恐ろしさ」{n}カシアは顎を上げ、控えめにうなずく。{/n}「これほどの地位と能力を持つ方が、航宙貴族の家の幸福に関心を寄せてくださったこと、大変光栄に思います」

languages.text: « Vos couleurs, seigneur inquisiteur, sont aussi riches que complexes. Je n'avais encore jamais rien vu de tel. Toutes ces nuances distinctes qui se succèdent les unes aux autres... dans une incroyable harmonie. Incroyable... et effrayante. » {n}Cassia relève le menton et hoche timidement la tête.{/n} « Qu'un homme d'une telle stature et d'un tel talent s'intéresse au bien-être d'une maison de la Navis Nobilite est un grand honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: « Vos couleurs, seigneur inquisiteur, sont aussi riches que complexes. Je n'avais encore jamais rien vu de tel. Toutes ces nuances distinctes qui se succèdent les unes aux autres... dans une incroyable harmonie. Incroyable... et effrayante. » {n}Cassia relève le menton et hoche timidement la tête.{/n} « Qu'un homme d'une telle stature et d'un tel talent s'intéresse au bien-être d'une maison de la Navis Nobilite est un grand honneur. »

languages.text: "Eure Farben, Großinquisitor, sind so reich wie mannigfaltig. Ich habe so etwas noch nie gesehen. Ungetrübte Farbtöne, die vom einen zum nächsten fließen ... Eine erstaunliche Harmonie. Erstaunlich und ... beängstigend." {n}Cassia hebt das Kinn und nickt züchtig.{/n} "Es ist eine große Ehre, dass ein Mann von solchem Status und solchen Talenten sich für das Wohlergeben eines Hauses der Navis Nobilite interessiert."
languages.original_text: "Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."

Eine erstaunliche Harmonie. Erstaunlich und ... beänstigend." {n}Cassia hebt das Kinn und nickt züchtig.{/n} "Es ist eine große Ehre, dass ein Mann von solchem Status und solchen Talenten sich für das Wohlergeben eines Hauses der Navis Nobilite interessiert."

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, renkleriniz... Zengin oldukları kadar karmaşık da. Daha evvel böyle berrak renklerin oluşturduğu bir cümbüşe hiç rastlamamıştım... Ahenkleri harikulade. Harikulade ve... Dehşet verici." {n}Cassia, çenesini kaldırıp başıyla hafifçe onaylıyor.{/n} "Böylesi mevki ve kabiliyet sahibi birinin bir Navis Nobilite hanesini düşünüyor olması, bizim için büyük onurdur."
languages.original_text: "Your colours, Lord Inquisitor, are as rich as they are multifaceted. I have never encountered anything like it before — unclouded hues flowing from one to the next... Amazing harmony. Amazing and... frightening." {n}Cassia raises her chin and nods demurely.{/n} "That a man of such status and talents has taken an interest in the well-being of a Navis Nobilite House is a great honour."
